document_data.name: Rumeltocey
document_data.mainbody: '''Rumeltocey''' was a [[human]] [[cleric|priest]] of [[Milil]] renowned for her singing voice.
document_data.Description: Clad in flowing blue robes, Rumeltocey had fair skin and blonde hair.
document_data.Activities: Her considerable singing talent was known far and wide, and Rumeltocey often found herself invited to meet the rich and powerful of many cities. Occasionally, she would travel with Milil-worshiping bards. Rumeltocey eventually became unsure of her faith, wondering where her true commitment lay.
